definition.name: Attest SBOM
definition.description: Generate SBOM attestations for build artifacts
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: subject-path
inputs.description: Path to the artifact serving as the subject of the attestation. Must specify exactly one of "subject-path", "subject-digest", or "subject-checksums". May contain a glob pattern or list of paths (total subject count cannot exceed 1024).

inputs.name: subject-digest
inputs.description: SHA256 digest of the subject for the attestation. Must be in the form "sha256:hex_digest" (e.g. "sha256:abc123..."). Must specify exactly one of "subject-path", "subject-digest", or "subject-checksums".

inputs.name: subject-name
inputs.description: Subject name as it should appear in the attestation. Required when identifying the subject with the "subject-digest" input.

inputs.name: subject-checksums
inputs.description: Path to checksums file containing digest and name of subjects for attestation. Must specify exactly one of "subject-path", "subject-digest", or "subject-checksums".

inputs.name: sbom-path
inputs.description: Path to the JSON-formatted SBOM file to attest. File size cannot exceed 16MB.

inputs.name: push-to-registry
inputs.description: Whether to push the provenance statement to the image registry. Requires that the "subject-name" parameter specify the fully-qualified image name and that the "subject-digest" parameter be specified. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: show-summary
inputs.description: Whether to attach a list of generated attestations to the workflow run summary page. Defaults to true.

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: The GitHub token used to make authenticated API requests.

outputs.name: bundle-path
outputs.description: The path to the file containing the attestation bundle.

outputs.name: attestation-url
outputs.description: The URL for the attestation summary.
